Authors:
Audrey L.C. Chew, Yee Shin Tan, Dennis E Desjardin, Musa
Yusoff, Sabaratnam Vikineswary
Title:
Taxonomic and phylogenetic re-evaluation of Mycena
illuminans
Keywords:
basidiomycete, bioluminescence, culture morphology, fungi,
phylogeny, taxonomy
Abstract:
Mycena illuminans Henn. is described and re-evaluated
based on recently collected material from peninsular Malaysia, providing
comprehensive descriptions, illustrations and photographs. In addition
to morphological data, axenic monokaryon and dikaryon cultures were
established to provide data on culture morphology and the mating system
of the species. Molecular sequences data from the nuclear large subunit
(LSU) gene also are presented, confirming that M. illuminans is not a
synonym of Mycena chlorophos.

trees.title: Mycena illuminans ML analysis of LSU dataset
